Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.common

Interface Server

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ProcessorServer
    public interface Server
    A generic server.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void blockUntilShutdown()
      Waits until the server has shutdown.
      int getPort()
      Gets the port that the server is bound to.
      boolean isRunning()
      Whether the server is running.
      void shutdown()
      Tells the server to shutdown receiving requests and to shut down.
      void start()
      Starts the server.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Starts the server.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is some failure doing the set-up for the server, i.e. the port cannot be bound, etc.

      • shutdown

        void shutdown()
        Tells the server to shutdown receiving requests and to shut down.

      • blockUntilShutdown

        void blockUntilShutdown()
                 throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Waits until the server has shutdown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread is interrupted while waiting for the shutdown to finish.

      • getPort

        int getPort()
        Gets the port that the server is bound to.
        Returns:
        The integer port.

      • isRunning

        boolean isRunning()
        Whether the server is running.
        Returns:
        True if running, False if not running.
